scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:ts && bun run build:copy
scripts.build:ts: bun build src/background.ts src/popup/popup.ts --outdir dist --target browser --minify && bun build src/popup/popup.ts --outdir dist/popup --target browser --minify
scripts.build:copy: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp -r public/* dist/
